description: A wallpaper that shows the current bitcoin price. At the moment it's very basic and updates the USD price every 5 seconds (configurable) from the CoinGecko API. More features are planned, and you can help, as it's open source at https://github.com/realandrew/btc-live-wallpaper (it's an HTML5 project so easy to contribute to unlike a typical Wallpaper Engine scene).
title: Bitcoin Live Price Wallpaper
